website_summaries.verdict: While the fit is much larger and looser than expected, the insulation power is still substantial. Those who work in freezing conditions or plan to visit colder regions will appreciate this neck warmer.
pros: Sold as an economical two pack
Soft inner lining is very well insulated
Does not reduce visibility for outdoor work
cons: Fit is definitely on the larger, looser side
Shorter length, does not cover both neck and face

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and warm, but is stinky and causes my glasses to fog
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why people complain about it being to larger or falling down. I found that the material has enough elasticity to stay upright-- in fact for me to keep the neck warmer below my mouth, I have to tuck it under my chin. This item has been one of the greatest additions to my winter wardrobe. It keeps my neck warmer than scarves do, and I can hide my face when people cough around me. The only downsides are (1) the fleece smells a bit dusty or like chemicals-- even after washing, and I notice it when I cover my mouth/nose, and (2) my glasses fog up when I cover my mouth/nose.
customer_reviews.author: Arnazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I am a (female) dog walker in NYC. As anyone in New York knows, we are having a brutal winter so far. I ordered this over my holiday break and cannot believe how effective it is! I was almost hot today wearing it (and other layers of course) in 15 degree temps. You can keep it on your neck or pull it up over your ears and/or mouth. VERY warm, a must have for anyome working outside in cold temps! Because this came with 2, I gave the other one to my husband and he said the same thing as me--best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: juniorj

customer_reviews.title: Great material, but only for people with a bigger head/neck.
customer_reviews.text: This could be an amazing neck gaiter, the material is nice and thick and probably would keep you very warm. However, the neck gaiter is not very long and it's very wide. I do not have a big neck so when I went to wear it, it hangs more like an infinity scarf on me. It was much too wide for me to be able to cover my chin or mouth as it just falls down. This is probably great for people who have a bigger head/neck. If it had a pull cord like some of the other neck gaiters I would give this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne T.

customer_reviews.title: These are great for winter!
customer_reviews.text: I just moved to Chicago and purchase these to wear underneath my scarf to cover my mouth/nose in the windy snow. They are great, I love the lining that is so warm and a great quality! Compared to similar products these are a great deal for the price, and they are the perfect size (vs. other products that are much tighter and harder to put on)
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: VERY WARM
customer_reviews.text: I'm a delivery driver and get in and out of my vehicle all day long. This neck gaiter is extremely thick, warm, flexible, and comfortable. This easily pulls up over my face and stays there but also can be tucked down if needed. The fleece lining is super soft and comfy. I can't recommend this enough for anyone who works in extreme temperatures. I got black but I think it's great that there is a selection of a few colors. I might buy a burgundy set and brown set soon. I would also give have no problem giving these as holiday gifts and this is a gift that will last!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K. Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: Warm, Comfortable Solution to Protect your Throat from Extreme Cold
customer_reviews.text: My Wife and I shared this set of two neck warmers in late December in sub-zero temperatures (Fahrenheit) and were extremely warm and comfortable. We used them snow shoeing near the South entrance to Glacier National Park at Essex Montana, after a 40" show fall. I wish my gloves were as warm as these neck warmers.
customer_reviews.author: DDeiganTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Durable, warm, wind blocking, good coverage
customer_reviews.text: Warmest neck gear! Soft and cozy inside, and the layers and outer tight knit do a better job of blocking the wind than thinner fabric or fleece. I’ve had several things like this over the years for everyday use and spending time outside/working with horses through the winter. This is the best. Wash nicely, too, and aren’t total hair magnets. At 5’4” I can have this cover up to my eyes and also stay nicely anchored around my neck inside my coats without extra folds or bunching. If you’re really tall, you might not get that coverage or it may feel tight.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Frugal Demanding

customer_reviews.title: Very warm, good for working outside.
customer_reviews.text: I work a graveyard shift manual labor job and don't like wearing thick jackets. I found with the scarf to block wind, a few light layers (long sleeve, hoodie, small arm warmers, longer socks, beanie sometimes) I can work comfortably enough in below 30 degree weather as I get warmed up by the work. Of course you may have to wear more to stay warm if you're not doing a lot of physical activity. For reference, I live in North Texas, so we get a lot of strong winds, cold rains, etc. The biggest convenience is that this scarf won't fall off and get caught everywhere, and the inside is very soft and doesn't scratch my face.
customer_reviews.author: Chana Rivka

customer_reviews.title: Horribly huge!
customer_reviews.text: This might work great if you have the neck size of an NFL linebacker! But then it'll stretch out so bad even they can't use it. Would only be useful if it could keep on stretching enough to wrap around twice. Wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: Toasty, Comfortable, Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear in New York last week, and was so confident in the product, I bought and rushed another set to our friends in NYC. These saved our lives as the Bombcyclone approached! You can even pull them up over your nose and still have plenty of neck coverage for warmth. Our friends kept thanking us, saying this was the best addition to their cold weather clothes they've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mielke

customer_reviews.title: Low quality and too large
customer_reviews.text: Really loose/large. Low quality fleece inside and low quality acrylic on the outside that pills really easily. So awful that I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rafferty

customer_reviews.title: Way too BIG!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for myself and was too loose to keep the cold air from coming in. Let my boyfriend try it on.. Was even to big for him! Gave it 3 stars b/c the inside was really soft. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Totally comfortable and WARM
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the thinner neck gaiters these neck warmers have more room and as such are very comfortable. They work well to block cold wind, look good - fit well and don't irritate dry cold skin... The synthetic fur lining is thick and does not nap up with wear ... Highly recommended -
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: These are made for someone whose neck and head is way bigger than the average person. It should fit tight to your neck and stretch to fit over your face but instead, it's still big over your face so it doesn't really provide great warmth. The two in the pack were different sizes to top it off.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good value it’s warm
customer_reviews.text: It is a good value, it is warm it covers your neck. It does not have much elasticity but it fits my wide neck I use a 18 or xxl size shirt. It has a dual layer construction. You can pull it over your mouth but I don’t know if with activity it will stay put. I will use it in conjunction with a face mask. One thing I would have liked is for it to be longer and a little more elasticity but for the price it is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Nunez

customer_reviews.title: I still recommend for average use
customer_reviews.text: Overall these do the job. They do not fit as snug around the chin as they look in the picture - but its close enough to keep me warm. First time using this kind of scarf and was impressed. Looks a little goofy but it is much warmer and easier to use than a normal scarf. I bought it to keep me warm on my motorcycle during the MidAtantic winter months. Although it does keep me warm, I could not stuff it under the helmet rim to seal it. No worries though, I still recommend for average use.
customer_reviews.author: H. Clemson

customer_reviews.title: Great for Winter, Very Warm
customer_reviews.text: I moved way north from the midwest and wasnt accustomed to the wind I was now experiencing. This neck warmer was a life saver for me during my first winter. I actually ended up buying 4 because I was having visitors from home and I knew they would have the same issues I was having. They loved them! These fit a little snug on me but I have a gigantic neck and head
customer_reviews.author: Adam Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He works outside and came home for lunch freezing the other day. I had just gotten this before he got home and gave it to him to use going back to work. He said he wasn’t cold anymore. These work wonderfully and he said was very very soft. Would buy again if he needs more for sure. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: oawalden

customer_reviews.title: Like these a lot
customer_reviews.text: These neck warmers are pretty darn good. The do a good job of protecting all around your neck when the cold winds blow. They come out of the washer with no apparent issues and they are comfortable to wear. You hardly even know it's on once you put it in place. One suggestion might be to but a bit of spandex in them so they could conform i bit tighter to one's neck. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Warm and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my significant other, who is outdoors a lot and hates cold weather. He, like a lot of people, has short hair and refuses to wear a scarf ("real men don't wear scarves") to protect his bare neck. He raves about this not-a-scarf(which is what we have come to calling it). He says he swears it feels like its producing heat, like its plugged in or something! I've even caught him wearing it around the house. It came as a 2-pack so i get to enjoy one too. It is very soft and comfortable, snuggly even. I have a lot of scarves, but this thing is really cozy.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Super warm!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a warm scarf to match my ski outfit. I ordered the purple and blue 2pack. I’m so happy I purchase these scarfs. It’s super warm and cozy. I loved it so much I bought the black 2pack for my husband to wear. To see more product reviews and photos visit my amazon profile page and follow me for more amazon fashion reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Monay Christina

customer_reviews.title: ... person that works out in the winter time air excellent product excellent idea by one will love it
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute must for a person that works out in the winter time air excellent product excellent idea by one will love it. My sister runs a horse ranch she feeds before daylight and usually works till after dark and cold 19 to 20 degree weather she couldn't get by without one
customer_reviews.author: kasey carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how I lived without this!
customer_reviews.text: These are super soft and keep you very warm! Feeding hay to cattle in the Missouri winter is a very cold necessary chore but these neck/face warmers make it so much easier. The wind does not penetrate through them while riding on the ATV and I don't end up with a frozen mouth & chin. Which allows me to be able to talk to my cows and politely ask them to not run me over and move out of the way while I am cutting the baling twine before putting the bale in the feeder. I highly recommend these for anyone who has no choice but to be outside in the cold weather for an extended period of time!
customer_reviews.author: Dane Lady Dawn

customer_reviews.title: BEST Item I have bought in a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I never had one of these neck scarfs before.. I was up in Virginia City, Nevada-Ghost Town, it got down to 19 degrees F. and This was my saving grace, LOVED LOVED LOVED them.. kept me so warm and toasty, I didn't need a scarf around my entire body, just this honestly helped keep me warm all this extended weekend.. THank you, so glad I bought two.. YAY for me!!! -v
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Warmer then all the scarfs and balaclavas i own
customer_reviews.text: I love this neck warmer It is soft and warm It is very comfortable I wear this every day while walking my dog. One of the best products I’ve tried for cold weather
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Well if you like super soft and super warm , you gotta buy this, I got one for me and tried to hide the other one for me but the wife caught me , she didn't find it amusing , but I like abuse , and pain and ,that's why I got married , don't hide it from them . Seriously very nice ,super soft and warm. Would buy again in a heart beat. your neck will never be able to thank you enough.
customer_reviews.author: R & L

customer_reviews.title: Husband LOVES This
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my my husband and me when we walk our 2 Coonhounds. This gaiter, which I think is a darn good value in the 2 pack, is extremely warm and comfy. It's lined with what we call "Wooby" soft blanket material. No more cold wind rushing down our coats on the trails! Also love that it's not like the traditional winter scarves that you have to fight with to get to lay right. Just slip this baby on and feel toasty with zero hassle. Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably Warm!
customer_reviews.text: SO TOASTY WARM! Your breath helps this keep you even warmer since this isn’t a tight fitting unit, it’s easier to pull up over your mouth and breath more freely. Sizing seems a little large at first but then after you realize it’s loose for a reason, it really was designed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mc

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says, but it will ROAST you if it's not cold enough.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. I purchased one for myself, my mother and my aunt for the harsh, cold winter weather. Well, low and behold it's been over 40 degrees the past few days....and I assumed this wouldn't be bad to wear during my walk home which is about a mile, give or a take a few hills....BOY was I wrong. I roasted in my neck area so bad that I had to wash it when I came home because it turned into a sauna. I was literally sweating...in 40 degree weather! So I must say, make sure it's cold enough for this product to do it's job..otherwise you will roast in the neck area and drip sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Belle B

customer_reviews.title: Great but wayyy oversized.
customer_reviews.text: This is nice BUT very oversized. I purchased this as a stocking stuffer for my husband and he was less impressed with the oversize material. It does not look like the picture HOWEVER it is very warm. If they were to reshape it to fit like the picture there is no question that this product would sell out.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Simms

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to help a trash man survive the winter!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a trash man and we live in New England. The winters are brutal here and sometimes the air is too cold to breathe in! I've purchased him a few face warmers like this but he says these are by far the best ones - very high quality and have survived many washes in the washing machine so far. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Stays up pretty well and keeps me warm.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of these. I accidentally left one of these in Maine when I was there for a visit. We were in below-zero temperature weather skiing and this really help keep me warm along with my other clothing. If it says expected it doesn't itch and it stays up pretty well. I have a fairly small head and it seemed to stay up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Thick, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: These fit a little larger than what is shown in the picture of the item. Would fit perfectly for someone with a larger neck. However, they are still very warm. Soft, fleece-like material on the inside. I live in North Dakota and when it was -50 wind chill, these were nice to have. They don’t work well as a face mask, more so just for protection and warmth of your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Kellee B

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice Sherpa inside. Fit is good. Never had one of these, but excited to have a few of them to try because winter neck scarfs never stay in place for purposes of warmth. We recently moved to the Rocky Mountains of Colorado, living at high elevation. I bought a number of these to stock in our emergency winter packs carried in our vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Faith M.

customer_reviews.title: Thick and warm but need to be longer so you can tuck it in
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and thick but it needs to be several inches longer so you can pull it up over your nose and mouth and still tuck it into your coat. The other ones I've had have been long enough to do this so I assumed these would be the same.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Better than a scarf
customer_reviews.text: I have to be careful putting it on if I have makeup but I love that it keeps me warm and easy to throw into purse
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Works as I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I thought from the photo it would have been bigger I bought it for my mom she has trouble breathing in the cold and she could possibly temper the cold by covering her mouth a d nose after I have it to her we have had a warm spell and she has only used it once
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Cursed ourselves into a warm winter
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Soft and neutral looking for a pair of boys who have to walk across a bitter cold campus (usually...) But, this has been a weirdly warm winter and they haven't had to use much. But, they love them and said they work really great on the colder days they did wear them.
customer_reviews.author: bz gardner

customer_reviews.title: larger fit, good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Chicago winters, which are brutal. My husband loves this and wears his all the time. I got a two pack assuming I could use one and my husband could use one. He uses both because it is a larger fit and too loose on me. I personally rather wear a tight fitting scarf instead of this product. Still very cool idea and product that fits and works for my husband!
customer_reviews.author: Carly krueger

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality - Bad Sizing
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and does keep you warm. However, they are just too big. I'm going to keep these in the cars, but look for a different option for hiking and running. I wouldn't recommend these for someone who is expecting it to stay covering your face. It fell down quite often on a 2.5 mile walk in the woods, which isn't very useful in my situation.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Just a neck wrap. Not for nose or ear coverage. Very thick.
customer_reviews.text: Neck wrap is literally a straight line across. If u put it over your nose it’s a straight line across. So it doesn’t do your ears. And if you do make it high up to cover your ears then it’s stright across your eyes and it’s short. So it won’t sit on your neck. So it’s literally only a neck wrap. Not meant to cover up to the nose or ears. And I’m short 5’1.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for this awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this neck/nose/mouth warmer..Its so helpful to keep you warm when its windy in the icy weather.I live in Iowa and I'm sure this is going to be really helpful this winter.I suffer from cold urticaria and this has been helping me a lot in avoiding getting hives on my face much better than a scarf.
customer_reviews.author: Deepa

customer_reviews.title: Soft, thick and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wore them in Antarctica - kept my neck and face protected and warm! They are soft, thick and comfortable and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Very very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Soft. Keeps your neck warm. Does not move or loose fitting like a scarf. Stays in place which is very important in the cold. Gave 3 black and three gray as Christmas stocking stuffers. Everyone was very pleased. Two were used for Sweden winters.
customer_reviews.author: Shari J.

customer_reviews.title: Was a waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.text: This is way too large. These sorts of things should be snug fitting to block the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Nellemia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a quick stocking stuffer and was really surprised when they turned out to be one of my husband's favorite gifts. He works outdoors, so, he's always layers, but his neck and face were always the spots that got cold. Problem solved! I will probably order more for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Angellew918

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly what I was hoping for! The inside is so soft and cozy, and it holds up in the wind - no chilly air seeps through. I just got it, so I can't speak about durability after washing, but my initial reaction is a very good one.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear when riding my motorcycle on a chilly day. I love it. It’s a bit thicker than I had hoped for so my helmet strap is at its limit....but overall I’d give it a 10!! Keeps me super warm and toasty and fits perfect. I’m 6’-1” and 220 and the size works great. I keep one in my saddlebags all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Adams

customer_reviews.title: A little big
customer_reviews.text: A little large for my wife’s neck; baggy below the chin. She is only 5’2” but she wears it like a hood to cover her neck and ears. Not ideal but the second set might make a good Xmas gift to a larger person.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Ittner

customer_reviews.title: soft, warm large size, easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: Received my first pair...worked so great, ordered another set for daughter. She uses them at work. has to work in the field and these are easy on and off with out recking your hair. soft, warm....
customer_reviews.author: Djcab

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, good fabric
customer_reviews.text: These are not as snug at the picture makes them look. they will work for being outside for short periods of time, but definitely not in the Ohio winters with wind and blustery days. Wish they were more closely fitting. Nicely made, good fabric, but for sure not the neck gator fit I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: BLT

customer_reviews.title: Does what it does, well.
customer_reviews.text: So much better than a scarf. It is warm and fills the void between your coat and neck. It can be pulled up to cover your nose and mouth which has the added benefit of pre-warming the air you breathe in. This can help if you are even slightly asthmatic.
customer_reviews.author: Trail walker

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I love these neck warmers
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love these neck warmers, and they kept our necks extremely warm in 30 degree weather. They don't have a chocking feeling, but are so soft and look great too! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki & Tim

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Keeps my neck and even the bottom of my ears nice and warm. Wish I had gotton these years ago. I said fit was as expected because other reviews said it runs a bit large and thats what I needed. Perfect for me. Had a bit of a odd smell when I took it out of the bag. But a bit of fabreeze and some airing out fixed that fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kittalla

customer_reviews.title: I gave mine away, but these are so warm I will repurchase next winter.
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear a coat (even though this winter was a brutal one) and this went a long way to making that possible. Unfortunately, I gave the spare to my father right away and then the one I kept for myself to a lady walking to work every day in subzero temperatures, but I will without a doubt be repurchasing this next winter.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: So warm I was sweating while snowboarding in sunny big bear
customer_reviews.author: Jem

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not alound to wear hoodies or balaclavas at work because of the peripheral vision I lose when wearing them. This is perfect for keeping my neck and most of my ears very warm. Wish I had it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me from being cold.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Michigan, and hate getting snow and wind in my jacket up by my neck. Scarves get lost or are just so bulky. This neck collar is the best thing around. Keeps the snow and wind off my neck, back and front. Have 2. Plan to get more.
customer_reviews.author: PRODG

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Soft, keeps your neck very warm. Does not move around or out of place as scarfs do. Gave 6 of them as Christmas gift stocking stuffers. Everyone was very pleased and sent pictures. Washed and hung dry after use with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Shari J.

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very good purchase with good delivery service. Saves space and not bulky at all. When people started sneezing/coughing and spreading germs around, I could cover my face with it and fend them off. More importantly, my husband approves too!
customer_reviews.author: 1lazycat

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned because I didn't know if "one size" really would fit. I gave it as a present but first tried it too. It was well received and had a soft, comfortable touch. Two warmers per package felt like a good value too; one in the wash, one to use.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pascual

customer_reviews.title: New favorite scarf
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband, who takes the bus to work. He loves how it keeps his neck warm, without the hassle of a regular scarf blowing in the wind. The best part is he can also use it to cover his nose and cheeks from the cold, wind and snow. This was a great purchase, they are warm and so very soft. Bonus you get two!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A.

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY...
customer_reviews.text: If you're thinking on using it for the COVID19 use something else. This is more for Winter use, gets too warm too fast by your breathing alone. If it's cold it okay.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the cold!
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft, easy to get on and off. They keep you very warm and I've even used one just to breathe into when out and about. They are durable and wash well! I could not recommend these more!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm
customer_reviews.text: This sucker is hot. I wore this during Chicago’s polar vortex when the temperatures were -55°. I was actually sweating. It would be nice if it had a more snug fit. I bout one for a friend who couldn’t wear it because it was too big for her neck.
customer_reviews.author: Genuinegirl2

customer_reviews.title: Picture is deceptive
customer_reviews.text: I returned these. The picture makes them look long enough to pull up to your face but they’re barely long enough to cover the neck. Not at all what I wanted. If you just want a fleece neck cover to use along with a scarf this may be fine but then it should be less expensive. If you want more coverage keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Great for working outside
customer_reviews.text: My husband drives for UPS and in the winter he is in layers from head to toe. Except for his face. Bought these and they work great. Plus they match his browns ;)
customer_reviews.author: Charli

customer_reviews.title: Seeking warmth in Colorado
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son and I for adventures during CO winters. It’s quite large, though. Really big on me and even bigger on my 12yo. Haven’t used them yet so I can’t give details on actual performance, but I’ll update once I do.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. They were to big. I like mine snug. It was soft. The only reason I gave 4 stars, is because it wasn't what I was looking for and they were a little big.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It really did the job. I work outside doing security work. It kept me incredibly warm. Kept the night are off of my neck. I would definitely recommend this to anyone that is trying to stay warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plenty warm
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect it to be this warm, very pleased. I’ve purchased other items I thought would be thick and warm enough only to be disappointed, not this one, it will do the job
customer_reviews.author: Vandel

customer_reviews.title: WARM keeps wind away
customer_reviews.text: A bit big, could fit an 18 inch neck with this. Keeps you very warm in the winter and probably is the only and best product on market. Keeps the wind away. Wearing this, a beanie, facemask and gloves keeps you warm.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my cold working environment. It is soft, extremely warm and washes well. I like that it goes as high as my ears and can be adjusted to a smaller size if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Fitchick2016

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 6 foot guy with a big head and this is way too big for me. Who on earth are they for? Also, if I wear it anywhere near or over my glasses/sunglasses, they fog up from the inside horribly, even if I breathe through my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: He said they are super warm and they're not too constricting or as tight ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dad to use during hunting season and he LOVES them. He said they are super warm and they're not too constricting or as tight as other neck warmers he's had in the past. Great quality for a great price. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Michelle

customer_reviews.title: So warm!
customer_reviews.text: I got this pack for me and my husband. They work great in the winter cold! I was just out on NYE in 10 degree weather and wore this and it really helped keep my neck and face warm. Plus, it's so soft! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Cluff

customer_reviews.title: Light weight warmth.😌
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cool fall days and approaching winter. Better than bulky heavy coats. Delivery was quick. Package of 2 was convenient to share.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good product and worth the $$$$
customer_reviews.text: They were very well made and kept my neck and ears warm while I shoveled the snow in cold temperatures. It was a little on the large size and kept falling down from my mouth area.. But, over all assessment is that it is a good product that is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Gringo70

customer_reviews.title: SUPER WARM AND COMFY NECKIES 👍
customer_reviews.text: It took a bit to “warm” up to these LoL 🙃 but let me say this...they are super warm, comfy and DO stay in place. The only possible drawback I have found is they are slightly bulky. Otherwise for the $ they are a steal!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter weather
customer_reviews.text: got these last xmas and I just got around to writing a review. I really like these and I know it keeps me a heck of a lot warmer when walking the dog. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D.

customer_reviews.title: Very Warm and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! They are so warm no matter the weather. The brown outside looks good and doesn’t stick out a lot and the inside is black, with a really soft and warm material(of course). I would recommend this for anyone that will be in less than 40-50 degrees fahrenheit because otherwise it will probably get too warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable, affordable
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these for my husband and I to use on a camping trip and they were life savers to sleep in. Very soft and comfortable and kept our necks and faces warm. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Peppergirl

customer_reviews.title: Buy one!!!! (I bought 2 lol)
customer_reviews.text: Okay it fits with a little room in it but I love that! Super warm and breathable! I walk or jog 2-3 miles outside almost every day and this has kept my face and neck incredibly warm and protected!!
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love! Them
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! These my husband and I walk the beach in the winter months in Massachusetts and oh boy these are so warm to put around your neck and keep your mouth warm. Great soft product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T. Levasseur

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and the inner lining is very soft. I bought this initially for my boyfriend who works outdoors in Ohio every day even in subzero temperatures. This is very warm and keeps the heat in around your neck! Because this is a two pack, I was even able to have one for myself which I love!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality at a nice price
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They are very warm and block the wind nicely. I think they are a good length too. The inside is nice and soft too
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Too Short, Wide, and Thick
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I didn't read the description right, but I wanted a neck gaiter that would cover both my face and my neck, this one does not. If you pull it up to cover your face, too much of your neck is exposed. Plus it's so wide it won't even stay up. It's also super thick and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son's since it's a two pack. They love them and wear them all the time. These are warm and comfortable. Great gift. Great for people who are outside in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Desirae Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price...
customer_reviews.text: I believe the Neck Warmers should be tighter to the neck.. in my case I will be using them for snowboarding and I feel it will be too loose, but over all great feel and quality. I have tried other brands that make your neck way warmer but good for the price and a pack of 2
customer_reviews.author: Majo

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Item as described works great for my boyfriend who is a UPS driver - only thing it is really big
customer_reviews.author: Diana carriglio

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite winter attire. I never leave home without one. They’re super warm, comfy and look good with any outfit. I don’t know how I survived before having them. I read complaints about how loosely they fit. I haven’t experienced this issue but I’m a big guy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great for gifts. Great for kids as well.
customer_reviews.text: I already bought this before so that is why i bought it again. Its great for gifts. My kid brother is using it and it helps a lot against the cold. I was standing in freezing temps outside for black friday. Lets just say i did not get cold while waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Castillo Fajardo

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm, good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and plush lining. The outer material is very soft and thick, like soft wool. It covers from my clavicle to the bridge of my nose. It's a little loose on me but it's snug on my boyfriend. Still warm even with a little slack. It's so comfy that I wear it even when it's no more than a little nippy.
customer_reviews.author: Solyka

customer_reviews.title: My wife loved them
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my wife and daughter and they absolutely loved it. They keep you warm and cozy especially help you walking outside in -20 F Minneaota winters.
customer_reviews.author: Sankar Bandi

customer_reviews.title: They do their job...in spades!!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say...THEY WORK! In fact, they Work just GREAT! Nice and thick and warm. They do their job, in spades!
customer_reviews.author: R.J.Trueman

customer_reviews.title: So COZY so WARM
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a stocking stuffer a few years ago.... let's just say, I have taken it under my wing and I'm never giving it back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: Very warm, recommended for average to extreme cold weather. I wear it as a hat under my hood, then I can pull down over my face and neck when needed. I still prefer a breathable balaclava style for over my mouth, but this is a very warm fleece.
customer_reviews.author: Chase A.

customer_reviews.title: Very Warm But Big
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go skiing and pull up around my face. It was extremely warm, but massive, so it kept falling down the whole time on the slopes. Would have preferred a more snug fit. I am on the smaller size, but I think these would be big on anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jess B.

customer_reviews.title: Work just fine
customer_reviews.text: They were too wide for my neck, so I ended up giving them to my stepdad. They fit well on him and keep his neck pretty warm. So if you have a slim neck, they might not work too well as the wind will find a way inside.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Too loose and large, but still usable.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for warmth, but like many other reviewers we found this item too large and loose to be as good as it should be. Will mostly wear it over a scarf, which makes it quite bulky, but we do like it’s height and ability to cover our chin.
customer_reviews.author: back2Idaho

product_meta.title: Arctic (2 Pack) Thick Heat Trapping Thermal Neck Warmers
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :8.2 x 6.4 x 1.9 inches; 6.88 Ounces
 * Item model number :DG-1128
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :November 30, 2016
 * Manufacturer :DG Hill
 * ASIN :B01MTV403F

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #80,707 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #173 inWomen's Cold Weather Neck Gaiters 
    *  #214 inMen's Cold Weather Neck Gaiters 
    *  #20571 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars2,375 ratings
feature_bullets: MULTI-FUNCTION DESIGN: neck warmers keep your neck protected with versatile styling options; with a fleece neck gaiter design you can wear it like a scarf or pull up as a face mask on a cold day.

THERMAL SHERPA LINED: the soft yet breathable fleece neck gaiters for men; Interior of the men’s and women’s neck warmer is warm and cozy; With a comfortable pull-on design these fleece gaiters fleece neck warmer slip over your head to cover neck, mouth, ears and face.

VERSATILE WINTER SPORTS ACCESSORIES: Neck warmer men and neck warmer women with moisture wicking and thermal properties these winter buffs are great for cold weather sports;Face cover for cold weather ideal for cycling, skiing, snowboarding, sledding, toboggan, running, commuting and other outdoor activities

DOUBLE LAYER CONSTRUCTION: Neck gaiter women and men offers protection in the coldest winds. The outer thermal shell: 100% Acrylic, inner Sherpa Lining: 100% Polyester; Adult neck gaiter is one size fits most men and women, measures 8”H x 11”L

COMFORTABLE FUNCTIONAL STYLE: Each winter neck warmer has high quality thermal yarn for max heat retention; the polar neck gaiter sets come in stylish colors to match all your gear choose from Grey, Black, Blue and Purple, or Brown.
